title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.18 - Outlet connections prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.18 - Outlet connections prohibited

State Regulations

No outlet connections, except for damper regulator, feedwater regulator, drains or steam gages, shall be placed on the pipes
connecting a water column to a power boiler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-10.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
